title: Food + Science = Victory! (Rebroadcast)
description: A kitchen wizard and a nutrition detective talk about the perfect hamburger, getting the most out of garlic, and why you should use vodka in just about everything.
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
